TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataListComponentEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a component editor for a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A component editor provides a user interface (UI) for editing the properties of a control.
## Examples The following code example uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate this editor with a class that extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> class.
[!code-csharp[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/VB/SimpleGridView.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 initialPage) cil managed

Docs.param: The index of the initial page.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, and sets its initial page to the specified index.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Type[] GetComponentEditorPages() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets an array of objects corresponding to the pages that can be edited using this editor.
Docs.returns: An array of objects corresponding to the pages that can be edited using this editor.

block.para: This method can be overridden to change the set of pages shown by the editor.
